Kade Keith

Welcome

I am a computer scientist in my senior year at Texas A&M University in College Station, TX. I'm specializing in Human Computer Interaction, Information Visualization, and Front-End development.

I research at the Interface Ecology lab, where we develop next gen human/computer interfaces. Between my research work and summer internships with Verizon and IBM, I have 3 years experience working on software development teams outside of the classroom. I've worked on major projects in Javascript/HTML5/CSS, C++, Python, and Java.

In addition to computers, I love politics, golf, and comic books. I don't have as much time to draw as I would like, but you can see some of my older work on this tumblr.

You can also connect with me on LinkedIn. Most of my code is on GitHub

Future

I just wrapped up an internship with IBM's Extreme Blue program in North Carolina. I am currently pursuing full time opportunities for when I graduate in May 2016. Check out my resume if you want to see more about my experience and skills.
